body_html: @soumith while we don’t want to have any math operations for half on CPU I feel like the argument given by @timothygebhard for having cat is very reasonable. Cat can be implemented efficiently because it doesn’t care how the data looks like, it’s only copying raw bytes around.
body_text: @soumith while we don’t want to have any math operations for half on CPU I feel like the argument given by @timothygebhard for having cat is very reasonable. Cat can be implemented efficiently because it doesn’t care how the data looks like, it’s only copying raw bytes around.
body: @soumith while we don’t want to have any math operations for half on CPU I feel like the argument given by @timothygebhard for having cat is very reasonable. Cat can be implemented efficiently because it doesn’t care how the data looks like, it’s only copying raw bytes around.
